English: Make sure you wait until obstacle appear before braking.
Bahasa: Pastikan Anda menunggu sampai rintangan muncul sebelum melakukan pengereman.

English: The obstacle has not yet spawned.
In {0} seconds it took you to react, you traveled a distance of {1} meters before braking.
Bahasa: Kamu memiliki reaksi selama {0} detik, berkendara sejauh {1} meter sebelum mengerem.

English: Make sure you brake when you see the obstacle by right clicking on the screen.
Bahasa: Pastikan kamu mengerem setelah melihat rintangannya muncul, dengan klik kanan ke layar

English: It took you {0} seconds to react and you were still travelling at {1}Km/h when you hit the obstacle.
Bahasa: Kamu memiliki reaksi selama {0} detik dan masih berjalan dengan kecepatan {1}Km/h ketika menabrak rintangan

English: The obstacle has not yet spawned.

An obstacle will randomly appear.
Right click on screen to hit brakes, and see if you stop in time.
Bahasa: Sebuah rintangan akan muncul secara acak. Klik kanan pada layar untuk menginjak rem, dan lihat apakah Anda berhenti tepat waktu.
